reuters.title: CPC INTERNATIONAL TO SELL STAKES IN ASIAN UNITS FOR 340 MLN DLRS TO AJINOMOTO
reuters.body: Antonovich Inc said an initial offering of 750,000 Class A common shares is under way at 9.625 dlrs each through underwriters led by Evans and Co Inc. It said it is selling 500,000 shares and shareholders the rest. Reuter 
